title: Retail Property (high street) to rent
address: 55 North Deeside Road, Bieldside, Aberdeen, UK AB15 9DB
full_description: The retail unit benefits from a glazed entrance door with full width display window with signage above. Internally, the accommodation comprises a front and rear retail area together with a kitchen, staff/customer welfare facilities and a storage cupboard. Finishes comprise suspended timber floor covered with laminate, with tiled floor finishes within the kitchen and toilet areas. Walls and ceilings are plastered and painted, with lighting provided by decorative pendant lighting and spotlights. Heating is by way of gas central heating. The subjects are available on the basis of a Full Repairing and Insuring lease on terms to be agreed. Any medium or long term lease will incorporate periodic rent reviews. Each party will bear their own legal costs incurred in the transaction. The ingoing tenant will be responsible for any Land and Buildings Transaction Tax (LBTT) and Registration Dues, as appropriate. By prior arrangement with the sole letting agents, to whom all formal offers should be submitted in Scottish legal form. The subject property is located along the South side of North Deeside Road within the popular and affluent Bieldside suburb of Aberdeen. Bieldside is located approximately 4 miles West of Aberdeen city centre, with North Deeside Road being the main arterial route to and from the West side of Aberdeen. Surrounding occupiers within the immediate area comprise a mix of residential and commercial occupiers. Commercial occupiers include the Bieldside Inn and Scotmid. All prices, rents and premiums quoted are exclusive of any VAT that may be applicable.

title: Serviced Office to rent
address: Westpoint House, Prospect Road Arnhall Business Park, AB32 6FJ
agent_address: Nicholson House, 41 Thames Street, Weybridge, Surrey, KT13 8JG
commercial_information: Use class orders: A2 Financial and Professional Services, B1 Business and B2 General Industrial
full_description: Serviced offices located to the west of Aberdeen within a modern building in an excellent business location. The air conditioned offices come fully furnished, have high speed broadband and IT support. The reception is manned during business hours and can provide secretarial support services if required, access to the offices is available 24 hours a day.  Clients benefit from meeting and conference rooms that can be hired when required and there is onsite video conferencing. There are kitchen and dining facilities, breakout areas, lifts, cycle storage, showers and plenty of car parking available.  We have thousands of offices available and can make your choice easier. Tell us what you need and we'll find the perfect match. From an entire building to a short-term desk.        This coworking space comes with everything you need to work (subject to availability) including:  -Full-furnished, and work-ready with business-grade wifi -A staffed reception where our friendly team can answer your calls, handle your mail and greet your guests -Useful on-site services like meeting rooms, extra desk space and virtual offices  All backed by our responsive, ready to help team to help you find the perfect fit.    From start-ups to large corporates, people choose coworking space for its flexibility and freedom from long-term commitment. Coworking also provides a more sociable way of working for remote workers, and gives homeworkers the structure and support they need to be productive.  -For start-ups: a space to focus for as many days a week as you need -For small businesses: a way to quickly scale up more space as you grow -For large businesses: the perfect solution for a distributed workforce so teams can work closer to home  Take a fixed term coworking space for a project, a number of desks on a rolling month contract, or simply turn up and hot desk whenever you need.    We know the world of offices inside-out - and we're here to help you find and use the right space, in the right place.  We've already helped hundreds of businesses get the advantage of professional space without commitment.  Whether you need more options or you're ready to arrange a viewing, we'd love to hear from you.  *DATA PROTECTION:  By completing the enquiry form on one of our property listings you explicitly agree to have your personal data shared with our third parties in order for Easy Offices to be able to provide you with the best product and services solutions. We will always treat your personal details with the upmost care and we will never sell them to other companies for marketing services. This in accordance with current GDPR regulation.

title: Office to rent
address: Suite 1, 58 Queens Road, Aberdeen
full_description: The suite provides cellular accommodation over both floors which has been refurbished to a very high standard.  The ground floor benefits from a ceiling height of 3.5 metres providing grand and prestigious accommodation fitting the exclusive West End address. The basement floor benefits from further offices, a kitchen, cleaners cupboard and male and female toilets which are refurbished and upgraded to a very high standard.  58 Queens Road is situated on the north side of Queens Road, opposite the exclusive Malmaison and Chester Hotels, within the heart of the established West End office district of Aberdeen. Union Street, Aberdeen’s principal retail and commercial thoroughfare is a short drive away. Anderson Drive which links to the main A90 trunk road is readily accessible to the west.

title: Office to rent
address: Kirkhill House, Aberdeen Business Park, AB21 0LQ
key_features: High quality double height reception area
Comfort cooling and raised access floors throughout
Open plan floor plates which contain an element of partitioning therefore reducing initial capex on tenants fit-out
Tea prep area, w.c and shower facilities
Excellent parking provision - 94 car parking spaces
The accommodation is available on a suite by suite basis or in combination
full_description: Kirkhill House is an imposing office HQ building arranged around a central reception and provides high quality office accommodation.

title: Industrial Park to rent
address: Lawson Drive, Aberdeen
key_features: Vehicular access via 2 Electrical roller shutter doors (5.5 m wide by 6m high)
Artificial lighting by high bay sodium spotlights
Mixture of open plan and cellular accommodation
full_description: LOCATION  The subjects are located on the west side of Lawson Drive which itself is accessed via Pitmedden Road. The subjects benefit from excellent transport links with the Dyce Railway station less than a mile away and Aberdeen International Airport 3.5 miles away. Connectivity will be further improved when the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (AWPR) completes in 2018.  Surrounding occupiers include Oceaneering, Stork, Weatherford and Scottish Fire and Rescue Service.  DESCRIPTION  The property comprises a detached modern industrial unit with two storey office to the front and associated secure yard facilities. The unit is of steel portal frame construction under a pitched roof and concrete block dado walls with insulated profile metal cladding above.  To the side of the property is a tarmac surfaced open storage yard that is secured by a perimeter fence.  Car parking is provided at the front of the unit. title: Light Industrial to rent
address: Gourdieburn, Potterton, Aberdeen, AB23 8UY
full_description: Summary Industrial Units to let in Aberdeen. Description The subjects comprise an end and mid-terraced industrial unit of steel portal frame construction off a concrete floor under a pitched roof. The roof has recently been replaced across the entire terrace. The subjects benefit from an eaves height of approx. 5.5 metres and two large electric roller shutter doors with the potential for adding a third at the rear of Bay 2. Externally there is a concrete yard to the rear which includes a wash bay. There is also potential to provide additional yard space to the front of the unit. Car parking is available at the front of the property. Location The property is located on the outskirts of Potterton approximately 3 miles north of Bridge of Don. The surrounding area is mainly rural in nature comprising a mixture of residential properties and farmland. The property benefits from direct access to the B999 which provides immediate access to the A90 dual carriageway, which is the main arterial route north and south. Aberdeen city centre is located approximately 7 miles south east. Connectivity to the area will be significantly improved upon the completion of the AWPR later this year.

title: Office to rent
address: 32 Scotstown Road,Bridge Of Don,Aberdeen,AB23 8HG
full_description: The property is situated on the east side of Scotstown Road, in a prominent roadside location within Bridge of Don Industrial Estate, lying approximately 4 miles north of the City Centre.  The subjects comprise a modern first floor office which is predominantly laid out in an open plan format within a two storey office building of concrete block and timber framed construction.  The property benefits from exclusive use of 13 car parking spaces to the front and rear of the building.  First Floor: 217.10 sq m (2,337 sq ft)  Reduced Rent: £30,000 per annum

title: Light Industrial to rent
address: Unit 1, 99 Crombie Road, Aberdeen, AB11 9QQ
floor_area: Gross Internal Floor Area 1,407.7 sq m (15,155 sq ft)
key_features: Gross Internal Floor Area 1,407.7 sq m (15,155 sq ft)
Excellent transport links to the harbour, city centre and south of the city
full_description: The subjects are located on the north side of Crombie Road close to its junction with Mansfield Road within the Torry area of Aberdeen. Torry is approximately 2 miles to the south of the city centre. Nearby occupiers include Churchill Drilling Tools, Aitken Group and King Foods.  The subjects comprise an end terraced industrial unit of steel portal construction infilled with concrete blockwork and pointed facing brickwork. The roof over is pitched and clad with cement fibre sheeting. Vehicle access is provided by way of a roller shutter door. Internally the workshop has an eaves height of 5.6m and benefits from gas fired warm air heaters. The office areas have plasterboard walls and ceiling and are heated by electric panel radiators.  To the front of the unit is a concrete forecourt providing parking for 4 vehicles. Free on street parking is also available.

title: Office to rent
address: Enterprise House, 4 Enterprise Drive, Westhill Industrial Estate, Westhill, AB32 6TQ
key_features: Highly specified two storey detached office pavilion
full_description: Enterprise House is a two storey detached pavilion of steel frame construction. The ground floor walls are blockwork incorporating double glazed windows. The first floor is metal clad with glazed curtain walling above. Internally, the office benefits from raised access floors and comfort cooling throughout. There is a centrally located lift and each floor has toilet and kitchen facilities. The ground floor includes a reception area and entrance vestibule. Around the perimeter of each floor, plasterboard and glazed partitions have formed a number of private executive offices and meeting rooms, with the central areas offering open plan office space. There are 88 on site car parking spaces.  Enterprise House is located within Westhill, approximately 8 miles west of Aberdeen city centre. The property is situated at the west end of Enterprise Drive within Westhill Industrial Estate. Westhill benefits from excellent accessibility to routes north, south and east to the city centre. The completion of the AWPR (Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route) has improved connectivity between Westhill and Aberdeen, its Airport and harbour, as well as reducing commuter times across the City and Shire. Surrounding occupiers include Technip, Schlumberger, Chap Construction, JFD Ltd and Bibby Offshore.

title: Distribution Warehouse to rent
address: Detached Warehouse, Kirkwood Business Park, Inverurie, AB51 7LE
full_description: The subjects comprise a detached industrial unit with ancillary office accommodation over ground and first floor. Externally there is a large concrete yard that surrounds the property, with a parking area to the front. The industrial element of the property is of steel portal frame construction off a concrete floor, with concrete dado walls and profile metal cladding above, under a pitched roof. High bay hanging lights provide natural light and is supplemented by translucent roof panels. Heating is provided via gas warm air blowers. The workshop benfits from four cranes in situ with a floor to underside of crane rail height of 4.62 metres. Vehicle access is provided via seven roller shutter doors. The offices are located to the right of the workshop and can be accessed via the workshop or a seperate entrance. The offices are arranged over ground and first floor and provide a high standard mixture of cellular and open plan space.

title: Office to rent
address: Pavilion 2, Discovery Drive, Westhill, Aberdeenshire, AB32
full_description: LOCATION The subjects are located in Westhill, which is a popular satellite town some 7.5 miles West of Aberdeen city centre and 7 miles from Aberdeen Airport. The property itself forms part of Arnhall Business Park and lies on Discovery Drive.  Arnhall Business Park is accessed from the A944 and B9119 which provides dual carriageway access to Aberdeen. The location is also well positioned to benefit from the newly opened Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (AWPR) at the Kingswells junction, improving connectivity north and south of the city.  Nearby occupiers include Kier, Rig Net, Ashtead Technology, Nessco, Prospector Offshore Drilling, Fairhurst, Skene Medical Group, FES, Costco and Tesco.  DESCRIPTION Pavilion 2 comprises a detached, two storey office building situated within a 3 pavilion development completed in 2006. The units have modern cladding externally with facing brick on the front elevation under a pitched clad roof.  Internally, the pavilion has been finished to a high standard, with raised access flooring and comfort cooling installed. The pavilion provides a combination of open plan space and private office and meeting rooms.  The subjects benefit from 10 on site car parking spaces. These will be available on a pro-rata basis.  ACCOMMODATION The following approximate net internal floor areas have been calculated in accordance with the RICS Code of Measuring Practice (6th Edition), and are as follows:  Ground Floor    237.46 sq m (2,556 sq ft)  RENT On application.  SERVICE CHARGE The ingoing tenant will be responsible for payment of a service charge for the upkeep of the common areas within the building as well as the upkeep of the common parts for the development. The service charge will also cover cost for electricity, heating and rates.  A budgeted service charge figure can be provided to interested parties on application.  LEASE TERMS The property is held on a Full Repairing and Insuring lease expiring 1st July 2022.  Our client is looking to sub-lease the ground floor suite which is surplus to their immediate requirements.  LEGAL COSTS Each party will bear their own legal costs associated with the documentation of a lease.  The ingoing tenant will be responsible for any LBTT and Registration Dues, if applicable.  ENTRY On conclusion of legal missives.  VAT VAT will be payable at the standard rate and all monies due under the lease.  ENERGY PERFORMANCE CERTIFICATE (EPC) The building benefits from an EPC rating of "D+".

title: Office to rent
address: 59 Main Street, Alford, Aberdeenshire, AB33 8PX
key_features: First Floor Office with Ground Floor File Store
Price: Offers in the Region of £140,000
full_description: The property is situated within the heart of Alford town centre, which is a popular commuter town and serves as the main central point for outlying rural areas. Alford is located approximately 26 miles to the west of Aberdeen.  The property comprises a first floor office suite accessed via a single glazed entrance door. The office is laid out in a mixture of open plan and cellular offices with a large reception area to the front.  There are two WCs accessed from the stairwell.  There is a ground floor file store to the rear of the property accessed via the side lane.  The property provides the following approximate floor areas, measured in accordance with International Property Measurement Standards (IPMS3):  Reception, 4 offices, boardroom, kitchen, secure file store, 2 WCs.  IPMS 3: 131.49 sq m (1,412 sq ft)

title: Office to rent
address: Pavilion 2, Discovery Drive, Westhill, Aberdeenshire, AB32
full_description: LOCATION The subjects are located in Westhill, which is a popular, expanding satellite town some 7.5 miles West of Aberdeen City Centre and 7 miles from Aberdeen Airport. The property itself forms part of Arnhall Business Park and lies on Discovery Drive. The town has a population in excess of 10,000 and in recent years has become an established office location, serving Aberdeen City and Aberdeenshire.  The subjects are located within part of Arnhall Business Park, set in similar commercial buildings which provide comparable office accommodation. Nearby occupiers include Scottish Water, Costco, Tesco, One Subsea, Prospector Drilling and Skene Healthcare Centre.  DESCRIPTION Pavilion 2 comprises a detached two storey office building situated within a 3 pavilion development completed in 2006. The units have modern cladding externally with facing brick on the front elevation under a pitched clad roof.  Internally, the pavilion has been finished to a high standard, with raised access flooring and comfort cooling installed. The pavilion provides a combination of open plan space and private office/meeting rooms.  The subjects benefit from 10 on site car parking spaces. title: Light Industrial to rent
address: Unit 8, Kingshill Commercial Park, Westhill, Aberdeenshire, AB32 6FQ
key_features: Structure capable of incorporating 10 tonne overhead crane
3 pipe VRV heat recovery air conditioning
full_description: Description Knight Property Group are developing an exciting new commercial business park, at Westhill, Aberdeenshire which is recognised as a world centre of excellence for underwater engineering. Nearby occupiers include Total, TAQA, Technip, NOV, Rever Offshore, Boskalis and Schlumberger. The development comprises a number of new build industrial properties each containing office, warehouse/workshop, secure concrete yards and private parking. Each property has been designed to a high specification, and will afford ingoing occupiers an excellent working environment. Knight Property Group and their agents would be delighted to speak with prospective occupiers on how they can be accommodated on the park. The properties are anticipated to have EPC rating of 'A'. Location Westhill is one of Aberdeen’s satellite towns with a population in excess of 10,000 situated approximately 10 kilometres (6 miles) west of the City Centre on the A944. Equidistant to the North, South and Centre of Aberdeen, Westhill provides the optimum location for business and for travelling to and from work. The town is within close proximity to the Aberdeen Western Peripheral route (AWPR), which intersects with the main Westhill to Aberdeen road. Westhill offers a full range of outstanding amenities for both the residential and working population. Shopping facilities include a Tesco Superstore, Marks and Spencer Simply Food Store, Aldi Supermarket, Costco Wholesale, along with a number of smaller shops located within the central shopping centre. Westhill also houses one of the top secondary schools in Aberdeenshire, along with 3 primary schools and a number of nurseries. Close by is a new state-of-the-art medical centre with chemist. A selection of hotels, bars and restaurants can also be found within the town.

title: Light Industrial to rent
address: Unit 4, Kingshill Commercial Park East, Westhill, AB32 6FQ
full_description: Description Knight Property Group has created an exciting new commercial business park, at Westhill, Aberdeenshire which is recognised as a world centre of excellence for underwater engineering. Unit 4 is a high quality detached facility, located in a prominent position, and available for immediate occupation. Nearby occupiers include Total, Technip, Rever Offshore, Boskalis and Schlumberger

title: Distribution Warehouse to rent
address: Units 1-5 Enterprise Drive, Aberdeen, AB32 6TQ
full_description: The subjects comprise a terrace of five industrial units with a circulation yard to the front/east side of the terrace and a tarmac storage yard area to the rear/west side. The terrace is of steel portal frame construction, off a concrete floor, under a pitched asbestos cement sheet roof with blockwork walls to dado height with insulated profile metal cladding above. There are full height concrete block walls sub dividing the units. Each unit provides workshop/warehouse accommodation with a small office area and welfare facilities to the front. The workshops benefit from gas Ambi-rad radiant tube heaters, high bay lighting and vehicle access is provided via roller shutter doors to the front. There is a shared car park to the west of the terrace which provides approx. 62 spaces.

title: Workshop to rent
address: Unit 2 West Pitmillan, Foveran, Aberdeenshire, AB41 6AL
full_description: The subjects comprise a modern single storey industrial unit with office accommodation. The workshop is of steel portal frame construction with dado height concrete block walls, concrete painted floor with a pitched insulated metal clad roof. Access is via two electrically operated roller doors. Staff facilities include two WCs and tea prep area. Lighting is provided by fluorescent strip fitments. The workshop has a minimum eaves height of approximately 4.5m  The offices are accessed via a single entrance door, with integrated access to the workshop. The accommodation comprises three private offices, WC and tea prep area. The walls and ceilings are painted plasterboard with carpeted floors with windows providing natural lighting together with fluorescent light fitments. Heating is provided by steel pressed radiators.  The property is situated in a semi-rural location, a short distance from the settlement of Foveran, some 4 miles south of Ellon and approximately 12 miles north of Aberdeen. The area benefits from good transport links with the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (AWPR) lying approximately 1 mile to the north and south.  More specifically, the property lies to the west of the B900 off an unclassified road.

title: Office to rent
address: Broadfold House, Broadfold Road, Aberdeen, AB23 8EE
full_description: The subjects comprise part of the second and third floors of surplus offices within our client's 4 storey detached office building, completed in the early 1980's. The external fabric of the building is consstructed with an insitu concrete frame and ground floor with pre-cast concrete upper floors, roof, and cladding panels. The front/ East elevation of the building is stepped back on a floor-by-floor level, whilst the rear/West elevation is vertical. The first floor projects beyond the front elevation of the ground floor, creating a canopy over the entrance. Full height enclosed stairwells project from the North and South elevations, giving access to all levels of the building. There is also a main central entrance, giving access to ground and first floors, with a lift providing access to the upper levels beyond. Each floor has its own kitchen together with male and female toilet facilities. Internally, the available office space has undergone an extensive refurbishment. There are carpet tiled floors, painted and/or papered walls, suspended tiled ceilings with integral LG7 lighting and good natural light via the perimeter double glazed windows. There is currently a mix of perimeter and column trunking. Heating is provided via ducted vents through the ceiling void, powered by an oil-fired boiler. The building benefits from a large tarmacadam surfaced car park to the front, with further car parking available to the rear of the building. There are approximately 226 spaces, including disabled spaces set within grass and shrub landscaped grounds. The boundary is secured with chain link fencing on metal posts and gate. The parking will be allocated on a pro-rata basis dependant on the extent of the accommodation occupied. An in-going occupier will benefit from use of a manned reception, shared meeting rooms and break out area all situated on the ground floor.

title: Office to rent
address: Northpoint, Suite E2 Exploration Drive, Aberdeen Energy Park, Aberdeen, AB23 8HZ
full_description: The premises comprise the first floor (Suite E2) of a modern two storey office building, surrounded by attractive mature landscaped grounds. Internally, the premises provide high quality office accommodation which is capable of a cellular or full open plan layout as a self-contained suite. The premises also benefits from modern communal tea prep and toilet facilities. The specification includes raised access flooring with carpet tile and painted plasterboard walls. There is exceptional natural light provision via full-height double glazed aluminium framed windows, whilst artificial lighting is provided via CAT2 fittings or recessed downlighters. The suite benefits from suspended tile ceilings and comfort cooling throughout. The suite benefits from a generous o-site car parking provision of 18 spaces.

title: Distribution Warehouse to rent
address: Units 3, 4, 5 & 6, Claymore Drive, Energy Development Centre, Aberdeen, AB23 8GD
full_description: The Energy Development Centre provides a range of contemporary workshop / office space, with electric roller shutter doors, from 144.40 sq m (1,554 sq ft). Set over two floors, close to Grub Cafe, the building provides car parking, secure cycle lockers and shower facilities within a mature landscape environment.

title: Office to rent
address: Glover Pavilion, Campus 3, Balgownie Road, Aberdeen, Aberdeenshire, AB22 8GW
full_description: The Glover Pavilion comprises a modern office pavilion of steel frame construction under a pitched metal deck roof. The available accommodation is contained over ground and first floors and consists of three largely open plan suites, albeit Suites 3 and 4 on the first floor have some internal partitioning. The suites are subject to a redecoration programme.  Located on Campus 3 of the Aberdeen Innovation Park, the Glover Pavilion provides open plan offices in an attractive Parkland environment. The Park is located to the south side of Balgownie Road, circa 3 miles north of the city centre and benefits from close links to the A90 trunk road network. Accessibility has been enhanced by the recent opening of the 3rd Don Crossing, providing easy access to the city centre.

title: Distribution Warehouse to rent
address: Unit 2 Woodside Road, Aberdeen, AB23 8EF
full_description: The property comprises a detached warehouse with impressive open plan office accommodation and yard to the rear. The warehouse is of steel portal frame construction with concrete blockwork externally harled and profile metal cladding above and roof, off a concrete floor. Internally, lighting is provided via translucent roof panels and supplemented by high bay light fitments. The warehouse benefits from vehicular access at the rear of the unit via an electric roller shutter door. The offices are located to the rear of the unit and are predominantly open plan with a couple of cellular offices and meeting rooms, all finished to a high standard. There are also W/C and kitchen facilities within the office accommodation.
